instructions: Set Android as a mobile hotspot in Settings > Network & Internet > Hotspot & tethering . Then connect your Windows computer to this network. Launch Feem on Android and on Windows too. You ll notice that both devices are given unusual names by the app (e.g. Junior Raccoon) and a password. Keep a note of the password, as you ll need it to establish the initial connection. Send a file from Android to Windows using Wi-Fi Direct, choose the destination device, and tap Send File . Browse for the file or files, then tap Send .
